Secure Recording

End-to-end encrypted capture with tamper-evident timestamps and chain-of-custody verification.

Our Foundation

Built on Principle

Every great cut starts with a steady hand, sharp tools, and clear vision.
Accountability is no different ‚Äî precision matters, and the details define the outcome.

01

Record

Truth is preserved through accurate, contemporaneous documentation. The blade doesn't lie ‚Äî neither does the timestamp.

02

Accountability

Power must answer to evidence, not narrative. A clean line requires a clean process.

03

Mercy

Documentation exists to prevent harm, not escalate it. The goal is resolution, not retribution.

04

Stewardship

Footage is handled responsibly, ethically, and with restraint. Your chair, your shop, your rules.

05

Transparency

Open processes build public trust. Every action is visible, every decision is documented, every method is disclosed.

06

Privacy

Data belongs to those who create it. No harvesting, no selling, no surveillance ‚Äî your footage stays yours.

‚úÇ

"The line between chaos and order is drawn with steady hands.
We don't just document truth ‚Äî we protect it."

Stewardship Commitment: These principles are not aspirational‚Äîthey are operational requirements. Every tool we build, every decision we make, and every action we take flows from these six commitments.

Read the complete governance framework ‚Üí

Development

What This Is Not

  • Vigilante technology
  • Replacement for legal counsel

Privacy Commitment

Barber Cam is built on a privacy-first architecture. We do not collect, store, sell, or share your personal data. Any future operational software will run locally on your device ‚Äî your data stays yours.

  • No tracking cookies
  • No analytics harvesting
  • No third-party data sharing
  • No behavioral profiling

Terms of Use

This preview site is provided for informational purposes only. By accessing this site, you agree to the following:

  • Content is subject to change without notice
  • No operational software is provided
  • All intellectual property rights are reserved
  • Unauthorized use may result in legal action

Ethical Framework

Barber Cam operates under six foundational commitments:

  • Truthful Record ‚Äî Accurate, verifiable documentation
  • Non-Escalation ‚Äî Recording to prevent, not provoke harm
  • Dignity ‚Äî Respect for all parties involved
  • Minimum Necessary ‚Äî Collect and retain minimally
  • Accountability ‚Äî Published standards and transparent decisions
  • Due Process ‚Äî Supporting fair outcomes, not shortcuts

Read full ethics framework ‚Üí

Legal Notice & Disclaimer

Barber Cam is under active development and is not yet operational. This site does not constitute legal advice. Recording laws vary by jurisdiction and context ‚Äî users are responsible for understanding and complying with applicable laws, consent requirements, and venue policies.

  • This is not legal advice
  • Consult licensed attorneys for legal guidance
  • Users are responsible for legal compliance
  • See FAQ for jurisdictional information

Faith Frontier

In the World, But Not of It

Faith Frontier is an ecclesiastical trust guided by the teachings of Jesus Christ and the witness tradition preserved in the Geneva Bible. We seek justice, mercy, and humility in public recordkeeping ‚Äî restoring community, sovereignty, and faith at human scale.

Notice: All materials published on Faith Frontier‚Äîincluding essays, commentary, and narrative content‚Äîare informational only and reflect good-faith documentation. Court dockets and official records referenced on faithfrontier.org are presented in trust to honor New Jersey Courts' commitment to integrity and transparency. Documents filed under penalty of perjury (such as court filings and sworn statements) remain under the jurisdiction of the appropriate court and should be read in their official context. Nothing authored on this site constitutes sworn testimony unless explicitly identified as a court document. For clarity, context, or pastoral guidance, email info@Tillerstead.com to speak with a Faith Frontier representative.

Faith Frontier Music

We will listen, consider removing the artist or song, or reply with pastoral advisement on why we left it up. Darkness to light.
